channel.title: Pink & Main on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Pink & Main on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #221*
item.description: It’s time for a new challenged with Addicted to CAS… for the next two weeks, we want to see you sharing your cards featuring stripes! I am the host for this challenge, which means this theme was my idea! Please share your clean and simple cards with strips with us HERE! I had a bit of trouble deciding on what I wanted to do for my card for this challenge… I have a lot of options when it comes to stripes.

item.title: *CASology #403*
item.description: Happy Tuesday creative friends… I saw my surgeon yesterday and as expected, the plaster splint was removed and I now have a removable brace. I can wear the brace when I’m up and about or if the arm/wrist is fatigued. I have some stretches thatI’ve started doing that are really tough but I am told it will all get easier… I am to use my arm and wrist as tolerated for anything non-weight bearing.

item.title: *Butterfly Celebrate*
item.description: Some more love to Pink Fresh Studio and their products… but lucky for you, I’ve switched to butterflies from flowers LOL! This is a great stamp that stamps up about a dozen butterflies all at once and the die cuts them all out at once as well. I stamped up a sheet of them with black ink and then blended some Tim Holtz inks over the top before cutting them all out.

item.title: *Less is More #462*
item.description: It’s time for a new challenge with the team at Less is More. As you can see from the graphic below, the prompt is “occupations”. As always, we hope you’ll play along with our challenge and share your creations with us HERE! I struggled a bit with the challenge as I don’t really have any stamps that scream “occupations” to me… so I had to think outside the box a little.

item.title: *A Lot More Fabulous*
item.description: Good morning crafty friends… just a quick post from me today to share another card with this gorgeous floral stamp set by Pink Fresh Studio. Card Info Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Seaside Spray Images: Pink Fresh Studio Beautiful Blooms, Happy Birthday Sentiments Ink: Memento Tuxedo Black; Versafine Clair Nocturne; Copics Dies: Pink Fresh Studio Beautiful Blooms Tools: Perfect Layers; Fricken Square Corners Embellishments: Nuvo Aqua Shimmer; Pink & Main Rainbow Pearls
